ygData.subject: Steps and Traditions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all,I m Lowlap and I m an addict. As you might have guessed,I have a little experience with 12 Step Programs,I have struggled with this disease since the
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,I'm Lowlap and I'm an addict. As you
might have guessed,I have a little experience with 12
Step Programs,I have struggled with this disease since
the days of Pong and Space Invaders! I would like to
take on a Service Position with this Fellowship. I
would like to become your tresurer. I will pass the hat
at every meeting to collect Platinum for coffee and
Elven Wine. "Keep comming back, it works!"
